explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: ensured the method is declared public static and uses existing project types (android.content.Context, java.lang.reflect.Method) without changing references; no additional fixes were required.
exception_handling: retained the original try-catch structure and behavior exactly, including rethrowing IllegalArgumentException and swallowing other exceptions while returning an empty string.
logic_customization: none
refactoring: renamed the method from get(Context, String) to propertyGet(Context, String) while preserving parameters, return type, internal variables, and reflection logic.
misc: added an inline reference URL comment above the method and applied minor formatting-only spacing adjustments without altering semantics.
